long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
TuroSearch - Discover & Follow Stocks

TuroSearch is a search engine that brings top search technology together with one-click access to all your favorite news sources.

Type in a Stock Ticker Symbol into TuroSearch to get real-time price information for that stock. You can also build a personalized watchlist.

Important:

By clicking "Add to Chrome", I accept and agree to install the Turosearch extension and change my default search to Bing, the Privacy Policy, and the Terms of Use.
Privacy: turosearch.com/privacy
Terms of Service: turosearch.com/terms

How it Works:

Search or Enter in a Stock Ticker Symbol

View Real-Time Quotes and Related News Stories

Add Stocks to your Watchlist for One-Click Access

Contact Us

We love feedback, you can reach out to us by emailing support@turosearch.com
